info.description: Samostalni ulazak u smještaj uz pomoć digitalne brave.
Ako otkažete, dobit ćete povrat cjelokupnog iznosa za preostala noćenja 24 h nakon otkazivanja, umanjen za naknadu za usluge i naknadu za čišćenje.
Domaćin ne dozvoljava organiziranje zabava ni pušenje.

accommodations.welcomeMessageEng: Each bed has it's own free locker and power point nearby. Big windows facing the court yard let in lots of sungliht. This is a party hostel. We have a very active bar till midnight then we go into town...

ownerInfo.accommodationInfo: This is a brand new hostel right in the heart of Zagreb. When I say brand new I mean we opened April 1st 2017. This building was previously a hostel but was dead for 6 months so we...
